H0.text: Which character was played by Linda Thorson in The Avengers. Cathy Gale

H2.text: Which character was played by Linda Thorson in The Avengers. Purdey

H3.text: Which character was played by Linda Thorson in The Avengers. Tara King

A4.text: Linda Thorson (born Linda Robinson; June 18, 1947) is a Canadian actress known for playing Tara King in The Avengers (1968â€“69).

A5.text: Linda Thorson is best known for her role as Tara King (succeeding Diana Rigg as Emma Peel) in the last series of the British TV adventure series, The Avengers, with the original star Patrick Macnee.
